Package controller

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
controller.Phase
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntermediateGamePlayPhase, IntermediateMapEditingPhase
public abstract class Phase
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to used an abstract state class, which is used to maintain/handle current phase state

  • Method Details

    • getString

      public abstract java.lang.String getString()
      This method is used to get the current phase in string format. For e.g.: In GamePlay StartUp Phase, it returns "Gameplay Start up"
      Returns:
      The current phase in string format

    • editMap

      public abstract void editMap​(java.lang.String p_mapPath)
      This function is used to invoke another function that loads Map for editing
      Parameters:
      p_mapPath - The path of the map to be loaded for editing

    • editContinent

      public abstract void editContinent​(java.lang.String[] p_command)

      Parameters:
      p_command - The command entered by the user

      public abstract void saveMap​(java.lang.String p_filename)
      This function is used to invoke another function that saves current map being edited
      Parameters:
      p_filename - The filename for the new map

      public abstract void validate()
      This function is used to validate current map and display appropriate message for the user

    • delop

      public abstract int delop​(Order p_order)
      This function is used to issue deploy order
      Parameters:
      p_order - The order object that needs to be added
      Returns:
      1 if the deploy order was issued else 0
